bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a patient feeling dryness and heat in the outer sections of the flesh/muscles or of a third person sensing heat when touching this region with his hand. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 87: 治熱勞，肌熱煩躁，面紅頰赤，人參湯方 , “To cure heat exhaustion, muscle heat with vexation and agitation; red face, red cheeks: recipe for a decoction with ren shen ”.
